p: You are commanded to have the body of Joseph Adams before the Law Commissioners Court of St Louis County on forthwith together with the time and cause of his detention by you to do and receive what shall then and there be adjudged concerning the said Joseph Adams & who as alleged in the annexed petition is restrained of his liberty by you
In testimony whereof I hereto set my hand & sesal of said Court at St Louis June 17th 1854
